page.title: 01CHARLTON LEA GARSDON GENERAL
page.content: Within the area are the Parishes of Charlton and Lea and Cleverton, which includes the village of Garsdon. Farming is very important, even though most people are employed in local towns and cities. Some families have lived in the same home for generations, usually working the land, but many have moved here from distant towns and cities to this pretty and peaceful part of the country. Employ- ment has often dictated these moves but no one seems to have any regrets. The housing varies greatly. Cotswold stone farmhouses any many cottages mingle with relatively new homes. School, Churches and Village Hall are focal points for activities and the residents have a lot enjoyment organising various events. The main land cover is enclosed rough grazing.
